0.4.0.name: wordpress/webplayer-yahoo
0.4.0.description:
This plugin adds the required javascript for WebPlayer Yahoo! and allows to set the parameters with a simply interface.

Using this plugin you can change your theme or upgrade it without set everytime Yahoo! WebPlayer code.

For more information about Yahoo! WebPlayer visit: webplayer.yahoo.com

Try Play your PlayList webapp

With songs you will see my face. If you prefer to use your face a donation is a good idea. Donate to Fabrizio Pivari
